name: Moen Sombra Spot Resist Stainless Single-Handle Pull-Out Sprayer Kitchen Faucet with Soap Dispenser and Power Clean, 87701SRS
short_description: POWER CLEAN: Power Clean spray technology provides 50% more spray power, for a faster clean
EASY TO INSTALL: Moen kitchen sink faucet features Duralock quick connect system for easy installation, comes with deck plate
SPOT RESISTANT: Spot Resist Stainless finish resists fingerprints and water spots for a cleaner looking kitchen
RETRACTABLE: Faucet pullout hose offers flexible water delivery and the hose retracts with ease

EVERY DROP, CERTIFIED SAFE: Every Moen residential kitchen and bath faucet complies with the Federal Safe Drinking Water Act and NSF 61 standards — making Moen the safe choice for clean drinking water
FLEXIBLE: Sombra kitchen faucets with sprayer and soap dispenser are compatible with a 1-, 2-, 3- or 4-hole sink configuration
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty
product_description: The Moen Sombra Spot Resist Stainless Single-Handle Pull-Out Sprayer Kitchen Faucet with Soap Dispenser is the ultimate kitchen faucet set designed to elevate your culinary space with style and functionality. This kitchen sink faucet is crafted with Moens renowned Spot Resist Stainless finish, ensuring your faucet remains free from fingerprints and water spots, maintaining a pristine look even with daily use. The sleek, modern design seamlessly integrates into any kitchen decor, making it a perfect choice for those looking to upgrade their kitchen sink faucet with sprayer. Experience the convenience of a pull-down spray head that offers exceptional maneuverability, allowing you to easily reach every corner of your sink. The Moen Sombra kitchen faucet set is equipped with Power Clean technology, delivering 50% more spray power compared to other faucets without this feature. This means you can tackle tough cleaning tasks with ease, whether you’re rinsing off dishes or washing produce. The single-handle design provides effortless control over water temperature and flow, making it a user-friendly addition to any kitchen. Enhance your kitchen’s functionality with the included soap dispenser, which adds a touch of convenience and elegance to your sink area.

name: Moen Nolia Spot Resist Stainless One-Handle High Arc Kitchen Faucet with Pull Down Sprayer and Soap Dispenser, Kitchen Sink Faucet Featuring Power Boost Technology, 87071SRS
short_description: BOOSTED PERFORMANCE: Power Boost technology delivers faster cleaning and filling with the press of a button; enjoy a more powerful stream or rinse at your kitchen sink
SPOT RESIST STAINLESS FINISH: The Spot Resist Stainless finish resists fingerprints and water spots, keeping your kitchen faucet looking clean and spotless with minimal maintenance
SMOOTH OPERATION: Equipped with the Reflex system for smooth operation, easy movement, and secure docking of the pulldown spray head for hassle-free use
EASY ONE-HANDLE CONTROL: Single lever handle allows for easy water temperature and flow control, making it simple to adjust with one hand

EVERY DROP, CERTIFIED SAFE: Every Moen residential kitchen and bath faucet complies with the Federal Safe Drinking Water Act and NSF 61 standards — making Moen the safe choice for clean drinking water
SOAP DISPENSER INCLUDED: Comes with a matching soap dispenser for a coordinated look and added convenience at your kitchen sink
EASY INSTALLATION: Standard design mounts directly on the sink or countertop, making installation quick and hassle-free
ADA COMPLIANT: Complies with Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) specifications for accessibility
product_description: Upgrade your kitchen with the Moen Nolia Chrome One-Handle High Arc Kitchen Faucet with Pull Down Sprayer. Designed with Moen’s innovative Power Boost(TM) technology, This innovative kitchen faucet delivers boosted water performance at the push of a button, allowing for faster filling and more powerful rinsing, making everyday kitchen tasks more efficient. The high arc spout provides ample room for large cookware, while the spot resist stainless finish is designed to resist fingerprints and water spots, keeping your faucet looking spotless with minimal maintenance—perfect for busy kitchens. Equipped with the Reflex(TM) system, this kitchen faucet with pull down sprayer ensures smooth operation, easy movement, and secure docking of the spray head for a seamless user experience. The flexible pulldown hose offers versatile water delivery and retracts effortlessly after each use. The single-handle design allows you to easily adjust water temperature and flow with one hand, while the included soap dispenser adds convenience and a cohesive look to your kitchen sink setup. Designed to comply with ADA specifications, this faucet is accessible to all and installs easily on your sink or countertop. Backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty, the Nolia kitchen faucet combines innovation, style, and reliability for a kitchen upgrade you'll love.

name: Signature Hardware 448174 Amberley 1.8 GPM Single Hole Pull Down Kitchen Faucet
short_description: Covered under Signature Hardware's 25 year limited
Faucet body constructed of brass

product_description: Boasting a classic look, the Amberley Single-Hole Kitchen Faucet perfectly complements traditional decor. The high-arching spout swivels 360 degrees and features a multifunction, pull-down sprayer with stream, spray, and pause settings that make dish cleaning and food prep easy. Made of durable materials, this fixture is made of solid brass with a smooth, corrosion-resistant finish.

name: Delta Daneri Brushed Nickel Kitchen Faucet with Pull-Out Sprayer, Modern Single Hole Kitchen Sink Faucet, Single Handle, Stainless 16879-SS-DST
short_description: GUARANTEED QUALITY: Quality is our top priority, so all our kitchen sink faucets are tested and certified, meeting or exceeding industry codes and standards
SINGLE HOLE INSTALLATION: Fits 1 or 3-hole 8 in. center installations with optional deck plate (included). Gasket seal helps prevent drips and splashes from leaking under the kitchen sink faucet.
LASTS 2X LONGER: Patented DIAMOND Seal Technology reduces leak points and lasts twice as long as the industry standard—ensuring leak-free operation for the life of the kitchen sink faucet
CORROSION-RESISTANT FINISH: Our Brilliance finishes are intentionally engineered for durability and tested for corrosion resistance to at least 2 times industry standards

TESTED AND CERTIFIED: All Delta kitchen faucet finishes are third-party certified and vigorously tested under extreme conditions to ensure years of dependable use without cracking, peeling, chipping, blistering or changing color over time
LEAD FREE COMPLIANT: Delta faucets comply with “lead-free” legislation. All Delta products meet or exceed the requirements of applicable product performance and U.S. safety industry standards
You can install with confidence, knowing Delta kitchen faucets are backed by Delta Faucet's Lifetime Limited Warranty
product_description: The contemporary, flowing profile of the Daneri™ Kitchen Pull-Out Faucet brings unique style and functionality to any kitchen space. Delta® MagnaTite® Docking uses a powerful integrated magnet to set your pull-out sprayer precisely into place and hold it there so it stays docked when not in use. Delta® kitchen faucets with Diamond Seal® Technology perform like new for life with a patented design which reduces leak points, is less hassle to install and lasts twice as long as the industry standard. Kitchen sink faucets with Touch-Clean® Spray Holes allow you to easily wipe away calcium and lime buildup with the touch of a finger. You can install with confidence, knowing that Delta kitchen faucets are backed by our Lifetime Limited Warranty.

name: Moen Genta LX Spot Resist Stainless One-Handle Modern Kitchen Faucet with Pull Down Sprayer and a Reflex Docking Head, Featuring Power Boost for a Faster Clean, 7882SRS
short_description: BOOSTED STREAM: Moen's exclusive Power Boost technology offers a faster clean and faster fill with the push of a button
RETRACTABLE: Equipped with the Reflex system for smooth operation, easy movement and secure docking of the spray head
EASY TO INSTALL: Features Duralock quick connect system for easy installation
SPOT RESISTANT: Spot Resist Stainless finish resists fingerprints and water spots for a cleaner looking kitchen
TEMPERATURE CONTROL: Single handle lever makes it easy to adjust the water
ADA COMPLIANT: Complies with Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) specifications
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty
product_description: The Moen Genta LX One-Handle Modern Kitchen Faucet is a perfect blend of style, functionality, and innovation for your kitchen. It has a durable Spot Resist Stainless finish, adding a touch of elegance to your kitchen that also resists fingerprints and water spots. Whether you're upgrading your kitchen or building a new one, the Moen Genta LX is the ideal choice for those who value both aesthetics and practicality. Experience the ultimate convenience with the Reflex Docking Head, which offers smooth retraction, easy movement, and secure docking of the pull down sprayer. It is engineered to make your daily kitchen tasks more efficient and enjoyable. The pull-down sprayer provides a powerful rinse, making it easier to tackle tough cleaning jobs, while the Power Boost technology delivers a faster clean and faster fill with just the push of a button. It's one-handle lever makes it easy to adjust water temperature and flow, providing you with precise control. The high-arc spout offers ample clearance for filling large pots and pans, making it a versatile addition to any kitchen. With its durable construction and reliable performance, this sink faucet is built to last, offering you years of trouble-free use. It is easy to install in a one or 3 hole setup.

2 FUNCTION SPRAY HEAD: Includes stream and sweep spray technologies. Sweep spray has angled nozzles that create a powerful blade to clean your dishes and sink
EASY INSTALL: Hose and spray head pre installed. Comes with flexible supply lines for easy water hook up. 1, 3 or 4 hole installation with escutcheon/deck plate included. Soap dispenser included.

Sweep spray features specially angled nozzles that form a wide, powerful blade of water to sweep your dishes and sink clean
KOHLER finishes featuring ScratchShield withstands even the toughest of daily use

product_description: A sleek design with a classically detailed handle, the Motif pull-down kitchen faucet adds an element of delight to any kitchen. The matching soap/lotion dispenser and two-function spray head make everyday chores a breeze.

product_description: Innovation with You in Mind. We’ve been making plumbing fixtures for over 100 years, so we know a few things about how to get water right where you want it. We were the first to market a lot of innovations that are standard today, and we have the awards to show for it.

name: American Standard 7421300.075 Raviv Pull-Down Kitchen Faucet with Sprayer and Soap Dispenser Stainless Steel
short_description: PULL-DOWN KITCHEN FAUCET: Dual sprayer features rinsing spray and regular stream
SMOOTH RETRACTION: Re-Trax system ensures smooth extension, retraction and docking of the faucet spray head
DRIP-FREE: This single-hole kitchen faucet features a quality ceramic disc valve ensuring drip-free performance for life
KITCHEN FAUCET PLUS: Includes everything you need to complete your sink, with pull-down faucet, soap dispenser, and deck plate to cover unused openings on 2-hole or 3-hole kitchen sinks
ROTATES 360°: Full rotation makes it ideal for use on a kitchen island sink
EASY TO INSTALL: For use on single-hole, 2-hole or 3-hole sinks and countertops with included deck plate
DURABLE FINISHES: Faucet finish resists scratches, corrosion and easily wipes clean
product_description: The Raviv Kitchen Faucet with Pull-Down Sprayer is a clean, transitional faucet that brings maximum efficiency to every kitchen task. Equipped with Re-Trax, the spray head extends and retracts with a smooth, flawless motion, and docks securely when done. This dual-spray kitchen faucet features a toggle button to easily switch between regular stream for filling pots, and spray for rinsing the sink. Engineered by American Standard to withstand the rigors of a busy kitchen, the Raviv Kitchen Faucet promises a lifetime of drip-free performance and exceptional beauty.
